sense.gloss: to reach an extreme, to reach a limit, to terminate, to come to an end
to be stuck, to be in a dilemma, to be at a loss
to be decided, to be settled

sdata.j: ↑下品|↑↓げひん↓↑極↑↓きわ↓まる|↑盛↑↓さか↓り↑場↑↓ば↓に↑通↑↓かよ↓いつける。
↑家庭↑↓かてい↓での↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓は、↑今↑↓いま↓、↑考↑↓かんが↓えると、みじめ|↑極↑↓きわ↓まる|ものであった。
sdata.e: When I think about it now, our family lived a very miserable life.
